quiz.title: Midterm Exam - Data Analysis with Excel
quiz.instructions:
Midterm Examination

Important: This exam uses randomized questions. Each student will receive a different set of questions from the question pools.

Required Files: Download the Excel files below. You will need them to answer the questions.

Time Limit: 60 minutes

Instructions:

  • Download all required Excel files
  • Complete the calculations in Excel
  • Answer the questions based on your analysis
  • You may use Excel functions and formulas
  • Show your work in your Excel file (you may be asked to upload it separately)

questions.title: Average Temperature
questions.body: Using the temperature_data.xlsx file, calculate the average temperature in Celsius. (Round to 1 decimal)

questions.title: Temperature Variance
questions.body: Using the temperature_data.xlsx file, calculate the variance of temperatures in Celsius. (Round to 2 decimals)

questions.title: Median Temperature
questions.body: Using the temperature_data.xlsx file, find the median temperature in Fahrenheit. (Round to 1 decimal)

questions.title: Temperature Distribution
questions.body: Based on your analysis of temperature_data.xlsx, which best describes the temperature distribution?

answers.text: Most temperatures cluster around the mean
There is a clear bimodal distribution

questions.title: Total Revenue Calculation
questions.body: Using sales_data.xlsx, calculate the total revenue across ALL products and months. (Round to nearest dollar)

questions.title: Best Performing Product
questions.body: Based on sales_data.xlsx, which product generated the highest total revenue?

questions.title: Average Monthly Sales
questions.body: Using sales_data.xlsx, calculate the average units sold per month across all products. (Round to nearest whole number)

questions.title: Mean Test Score
questions.body: Using statistics_data.xlsx, calculate the mean test score. (Round to 2 decimals)

questions.title: Standard Deviation of Scores
questions.body: Using statistics_data.xlsx, calculate the standard deviation of test scores. (Round to 2 decimals)

questions.title: Quartile Analysis
questions.body: Based on statistics_data.xlsx, what is the approximate first quartile (Q1) of the test scores?

question.title: Reflection: Data Analysis Process
question.body:
This question is the same for all students.

Reflect on the data analysis process you used in this exam. Describe:

  1. Which Excel functions were most useful?
  2. Any challenges you encountered
  3. How you verified your answers

Write 5-7 sentences.
